CellNetOptimizer (CNO) is a MATLAB toolbox for creating logic-based models of signal transduction networks, and training them agains high-throughput biochemical data. 

We are working on an open-source version of CellNetOptimizer. In the meantime, a version licensed under the  Creative Commons Attribution-No Derivative Works can be found here: http://www.cdpcenter.org/resources/software/cellnetoptimizer/
